scripts.create-db: docker exec -i jwt-authentication_myimage-postgres_1 psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE mydb;"
scripts.drop-db: docker exec -i jwt-authentication_myimage-postgres_1 psql -U postgres -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS mydb;"
scripts.restore-sql: docker exec -i jwt-authentication_myimage-postgres_1 psql -U postgres -d postgres < ./init.sql
scripts.db-restore: npm run backup-db && npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run restore-sql && npm run dbsync
